attributes.action: Amend the road traffic laws making it illegal to produce, own or operate 'stretched'  Limousine cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are told that we face a most serious environmental crisis and the car is viewed as a symbolic cause of our impending plight. We are being urged to rethink our personal transport and economise in every way possible. I therefore suggest the symbolism of the Padilla type stretched limousine with it’s 10-seater capacity is an obscenity that we simply cannot tolerate. 
I call upon the government to amend the law effectively banning these machines from our roads.
